meanings.definition: Resembling a butterfly in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The papilionaceous flower fluttered gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with colorful papilionaceous flowers.
meanings.sent3: The papilionaceous petals danced gracefully in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed behind her like papilionaceous wings.
meanings.sent5: The papilionaceous design on the kite caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the pea family of plants.
meanings.sent1: The papilionaceous leaves of the pea plant provided shade.
meanings.sent2: The farmer grew various papilionaceous crops in the field.
meanings.sent3: The papilionaceous vines twisted around the trellis in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The papilionaceous pods held the peas snugly inside.
meanings.sent5: The papilionaceous aroma of the pea soup filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Having petals that are irregular in shape and size.
meanings.sent1: The papilionaceous flower had petals of different sizes.
meanings.sent2: The bouquet was a mix of papilionaceous blooms.
meanings.sent3: The papilionaceous petals seemed to play a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her papilionaceous hair accessory added a touch of whimsy.
meanings.sent5: The papilionaceous colors of the garden created a vibrant display.
